posts.post_content:
Offered here is a S74-1 White Silk of Stone St Louis Americans. It has the more interesting of the two silk print designs with the criss cross bats , balls, glove and mask. Stone is tougher than most as are most American League Silks. This one does not have the back and displays some fraying top and bottom
34.99 plus 5.99 for shipping with tracking net
price drop before going to ebay auction
bump. Nice price on a tougher player
